title: Alarm initialization guards pattern
details:
v1.6.3.8-v5 introduced initialization guards for browser.alarms handlers in background.js:

1. All non-keepalive alarms (cleanup-orphaned, sync-session-state, diagnostic-snapshot) check `isInitialized` before execution and skip safely if false
2. Keepalive alarm handler `_handleKeepaliveAlarm()` only sends sidebar pings after initialization
3. `_sendAlivePingToSidebars()` uses optional chaining on globalQuickTabState for defensive safety
4. Skipped alarms log with ALARM_SKIPPED_NOT_INITIALIZED for debugging

Pattern: Always check `isInitialized` in alarm handlers that access globalQuickTabState or perform storage operations.
